Articles.Content:
Hi all!

This is the first craft file that I share so be kind

So to fly this thing you have to use cheats because it becomes unstable when the fuel is consumed... so in game use Alt+F12 and activate infinite FUEL and RCS.

Modlist:

-Interstellar lander from here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99841-WIP-Endurance-%28from-Interstellar%29-0-2-0-Lander-release!

(I had to change the trust power from the VTOL engines from 80 to 120 to be more powerful)

-Mark IV Spaceplane System - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101699-0-90-Mark-IV-Spaceplane-System-%2814-12-14-important-fixes!%29

-DSL Pandora - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12106-0-25-Lionhead-Aerospace-Inc-Icarus-v0-4-updated

-KW Rocketry (mk1 rcs pod + battery) - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014

-ERS led spotlight - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947-Exploration-Rover-System-by-A-S-E-T-%2810-10-14%29

-home tesla recon rover - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

-mechjeb + bill 9000 - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20420-23-Jeb-and-Bill-9000-a-smaller-radial-Jeb-for-the-Clarke-fans

-surface air brake b9 - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-90-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-8-%28updated-30-12-14%29

-Stock Part Revamp - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-90-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-7-1!

hope these are all the requirements

Actiongroup 1-Toggle horizontal engines

Actiongroup 2-Toggle VTOL engines

Actiongroup 5-Toggle bay doors

Actiongroup 6-Toggle ladders

Actiongroup 10 - Toggle legs

I want to thanks all the moders that made this possible

that's it!hope you like it... enjoy and have fun!

DOWNLOAD - https://www.dropbox.com/s/96dghv36o7xenor/Lander%2B.craft?dl=0

p.s. craft file is named "lander+"

Oh My God. I must try to recreate this in stock.

Problem is, there is a dozen other projects ahead that I need to do! D'oh!
